@LordCellofEarth9 I think your comment is really great. I also think this hentai can actually be adapted into manga or even anime like Redo of Healer.  Just minimize the sex, focus more on the plot. Maybe add another reincarnator to be FMC's nakama. So we have an FMC with tragic past (being raped) then actually allying herself with demons or demi-human and other reincarnators to fight against prince and Saintess. Add a romance between her and Martin (npc) as a subplot. This maybe actually be a masterpiece.

I have nothing insightful to add, Im just here for the good story. Part of me wishes a happy ending for Lily, but that seems increasingly unlikey to happen. At this point, I just want to see a scene of Alice's sadism to break away from Lily being constantly f'ed.

Plus you guys are making me "A LEGEND" by the fact your taking the time to comment about my posts instead of what's in them or the story as a whole! So add something behind "Har Dee Dar Long Walls of Text DUH!" it's boring and I want someone to talk to on this :(

I mean the Prince said it, Heroine was just what he got with the Villainess FMC, she saw him for the monster he was! The difference was their both DOMINATORS/SADISTS! Unless one of them is a Sadomasochist it won't work out as one must be on top! If Heroine is not obsessing over Villainess (The line makes it hard to tell) but him, then it's because his "strong will" makes her want to dominate him, but unlike him, she's unaware of what he found that makes them incompatible! Funny enough, Martin is the only thing keeping FMC "interesting" as if anything happens to him, she'll just "nope" even "accidents" will be seen as "going back on their deal not to harm him! Got to give it to FMC though, even when hit with the NTR Bullshit "cocaine a wonderful drug" sperm NTR Asshole Chad/Tyrones/Fat Guys have (his being LITERAL CANON LOL) she still hasn't fallen, since unlike NTR it won't end well for her if she does (unlike the BS "happy ends" in those, he WILL lose interest in her)

Now him being OP makes sense, after all the "ML in these's Otome" especially the RPG Dungeon mechanic one's are always suppose to be "the best of the best" as though the writer is "pushing the player to favor them as the main character" while the other options are just "What if's that aren't canon" (Look at the Harem ones where the Heroine is easy to guess out of all the girls! She's the one who is introduced first, gets the most scenes and has abilities that outright ASSURE unless your challenge running or to spite the writers they compliment you! Like a Mage/Healer when your MC is the Muscle, or opposite if your MC is the Mage/Healer! Ever played a game or Harem story where the Warrior MC "First Girl" is NOT a mage or healer! And this is taking into account the MC ISN'T also a Mage/Healer/ETC! Has first girl ever been a "Thief/Ranger/Non Warrior-Mage/Healer?" Nope! because the writers are "wink winking" you to their preferred Heroine, same here)

Yeah but my assestment after fully analyinzing the plot of this and the other! Damn I found that part funny with the "heroine's" doomed hope of trying to get the Prince (unless she was talking about the FMC Villainess). His attraction to the FMC reminds me of Fiancee Observation" hell the difference between the Prince here and Cecil in that one is the Prince is a murderer and tyrant while Cecil is just a sociopath who slowly became aware of it as he observed the reincarnated FMC Fiancee attempts to be a villain for HIS betterment! One thing he noted in the story that he loved the FMC over his brother's current fiancee his previous pick was the same with the Heroine in this story! The two were "TOO SIMILAR!" He "loves" the FMC as a Cat loves the mouse it caught! The more she fights, resist, hates him and is forced to say she loves him, the more she's "interesting!" The moment she falls though, well "he'll tire of her as she's no fun" so her resisting is good for her long term!

@whitedjlol Me apparently!  xD.  But I'll admit I did go overboard, I do get ranty sometimes! Despite the fact alot of those recent posts are less for this and more for the "Otome" manga/manhua/manhwa this reminds me of (and the other hentai doujin I mentioned with the isekai spineless office woman and the psycho younger man...hope a new chapter of that comes out)  I'm trying to condense my posts, but frankly the word count is too low for me, but I did get "Wordy" I'll admit
Jesus Christ who writes almost a paragraph of word in nhentai

But then again, it IS NTR in that she's being "NTR" from the "peaceful life she wants!" not MARTIN per say (Since he was a means to an end) Looked like the Prince became more determined the more she wished for a life "with him not in it!" and she sadly only catches his attention BECAUSE she hates him! Sure when she breaks he'll suddenly "dislike her again" LOL

In a way this and the last one weren't really NTR since she only went for the MOB cause he was a the "safe" option. But man, the one part I like about the Otome reincarnation genre is like Konosuba just how "Ruin your life CRAZY" the "Husbando/love interest/fishes" are, especially compared to the GOOD ML's of those stories! (By those, I mean the GOOD ones that don't put the FMC with any of the "OG Love Interests" Not all of them can be "Destruction Flag Otome Where the Villainess makes ALL the Love Interests, other Villainess AND the Heroine into her Harem by accident LOL!). So the negative points were from her constant attempts to run away from him (I mean she ain't wrong!) But not surprised he's OP in winning a Love Interest, he's got the ML halo, the story makes SURE he gets the girl he wants no matter WHAT with that super "cocaines a wonderful drug" sperm LOL)

Klaus actually went to the Mobuji village to do priest shit and met martin. He ate his sweets, girl got excited and touched his hand. Maizer ripped klaus hand and reveal that alice and him we're bussiness partners

@K.L girl becomes a villainess in an otome game. She wanted to pursue a side character called Martin, so she wanted to annul the engagement. Makes Zain (black haired prince) accidentally fell in love with her. Also makes Maizer fall in love, because she was different and would call him out for killing. Girl tells Maizer about Martin, Maizer proceeds to burn Mobuji village village next to where Martins lives (Macaroni village) to "prevent plague" thats ch 1

Interesting Hentai, it's why this one got me writing the "essay's" (Blame that on the word counter forcing me to have to make multiple posts! I'm thinking the Prince might have also been reincarnated similar to Lily, as these's stories occasionally has a reincarnator reincarnate as one of the love interests who decides to save and make the Villainess "his". But damn is the writer making alot of pot shots! The Mob she planned to cling to being treated as "irrelevant" because well...he's a "MOB" LOL (Not really NTR since really, she never loved the guy, he was just a safe option to avoid her bad ends) and Prince Charmless only loved her in a "Your mine, don't you get that" fashion once he realized she wasn't One Dimensional like the rest! (Or he's Gerald from Destruction Flag Otome who decided FUCK IT, locked Katarina in a tower and decided "anyone else who looks at what's mine funny get's it!...Let's be real if Gerald did that, it's be open war with him and Mary, the OTHER yandere who'd likely do this to Katarina! Only thing stopping them is slight common sense...well Gerald anyway, Mary is likely to full on BLOW IT ALL UP!)

Su Luxia ALSO takes shots at "Male Protagonists" like the Murderous Yandere Prince when they show up! Reminding that she's a moral person even when she's delivering vicious revenge! She will NEVER hurt or put into harm's way innocent bystanders or drag them into her plans as a casualty! She will NEVER ignore abusers of power or criminals! Even if their not the main target (s), she will even go out of her way to help unknowns if a part of her plan ends up or is about to drag them into trouble they didn't deserve (like a criminal angered by a THoT she destroyed planned on harming said THoT's other victims because she was two timing him AND them at once and had a thing with harming EVERYONE INVOLVED! She moved to ruin him quickly to PROTECT those other men as they were victims! And the THoT she destroyed needed to suffer her fate worse then death rather then die! And she will NEVER ignore Rapists! Likely came from the fact SHE use to be a fodder who suffered the fate of her clients!)

He easily recognizes her by the fact the character she's always incarnated as in each story ALWAYS has her name (Su Luxia) and they suffer a "character change" (Their meant to be cannon fodder or villainess in the stories, meant to be "Vanquished" for the main couple of the story! Her job is to change those girls fate as their spirits pay with their existence to get revenge against those who hurt them! As alot of the settings are Otome or bad romance stories that give the main "power couple" ALOT of BS hand waves and excuses to justify alot of boorish behavior! One part of the fun is Su Luxia DECONSTRUCTING alot of the ideas of these's "toxic romances" (like the Romeo and Juliet "different races" romances, or the "Our love can survive Poverty because we're both too use to living in luxury, wealth and authority and even "I love my criminal husband who murdered my family and abuses me" brain dead "FMC" she had to convince "didn't have to suffer that or love monsters!")

The first chapter implies he's aware he's a fictional character! (Noting how he can just kill and maim as he wishes and no one stops him!), and I think the "negative points with Lily" is the Otome game's "SYSTEM" viewing his words and aggression at her as him "hating her" because well, "aggressive yandere's act as though they hate you, their Object of Affection/OoA" when it's "pudd'n from Billy and Mandy's Love Bunny's "definition of Love" (In that it hurts!). He reminds me of a character from Cheating Men must die, who the FMC discovers is self-aware he's a book character and hates his situation, falling in love with the FMC when she takes possession of the Villainess of the story, his "CF" who died because "the story demanded he save the heroine over her!" revealing he loved the FMC because she wasn't a one-note character like everyone in the story was! FMC unlike the MC in this was able to escape him...too bad he escaped his world eventually and started stalking her in other arcs!

He can kill a man, and no one will care! Frankly I think he's self aware that he's a Otome character! He raped Lily (MC) as a "test" and is now obsessed with her (The other love interest is also so as well, but is well "A virgin Second Male Lead", so of course his response is to do "everything but tell the "object of his affection" how he feels as the artist makes fun of his "Incel behavior" which I kind of have to agree with LOL) basically, she fucked up the plot by going off the rails but instead of "Bakarina" hijinks! Instead it reminds me of "Cheating Men must Die" crazy shit

I mean even in the manhua/manhwa (Chinese/Korean Manga) versions of these's stories! Those "Prince" characters who are the "main love interests" are "butcher anyone who pisses me off crazy I have mommy issues" crazy when you think on it! WOULD kill the MC villainess, are played off as "misunderstood", have MOMMY ISSUES their likely taking out on the Villainess MC, which goes both ways in "I hate my mom and wish she was alive so I could kill her" and "I love mommy and want to fuck her! DAMN YOU DAD I'LL KILL YOU" crazy obsession! Funny enough the Second Male Lead that compete's is actually stable nice guy...who the villainess will dump in the end to go with the guy likely to kill her if he gets bored, or abuse her when he feels like it! "All Girls love Bad Boys" trope)

@K.L. Not that hard to sum up! It's the typical "Reborn as a Villainess" story! MC is reborn as the Villainess of an Otome game, tries to break the rules to save herself from the bad end by breaking her engagement with the Prince to marry a commoner Mob, but Prince is yandere for her instead and well, does what Yandere do when they're Love Interest tries to leave them! "Rape em to take out their frustration!" He's a deconstruction of "Ruin your life" Prince love interest in these's series who are all types of creepy "red flag in real life" types! In this case, the Prince is the "you don't leave me, I leave you" type! (Like "I'm the Villainess so I'm Taming the Last Boss" the Prince went nuts when SHE dumped him for his brother, so to have his cake and eat it, he planned to rape her to force marriage and get the heroine who is a Green Tea bitch, basically force her to do the work and be his, while loving the Heroine! This is what happens if his type were to succeed then fail basically!)
